parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma 3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListNBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Sorts given multicolumn listbox by [[lnbValue]] in given column in ascending or descending order.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lnbSortByValue''' [idc, column, reversed]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, column, reversed]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value>  idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value>  column: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value>  reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]]: descending / [[true]]: ascending. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lnbSortByValue''' [column, reversed]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value>  control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value>  [column, reversed]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value>  column: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value>  reversed (Optional): [[Boolean]] - [[false]]: descending / [[true]]: ascending. Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lnbSortByValue]] [1800, 1, [[false]]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_ctl [[lnbSortByValue]] [1, [[true]]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbSort]], [[lnbSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[tvSort]], [[lnbAddColumn]], [[lnbAddRow]], [[lnbClear]], [[lnbColor]], [[lnbCurSelRow]], [[lnbData]], [[lnbDeleteColumn]], [[lnbDeleteRow]], [[lnbGetColumnsPosition]], [[lnbPicture]], [[lnbSetColor]], [[lnbSetColumnsPos]], [[lnbSetCurSelRow]], [[lnbSetData]], [[lnbSetPicture]], [[lnbSetText]], [[lnbSetValue]], [[lnbSize]], [[lnbText]], [[lnbValue]]
</value></part></template>
